answers.text: Delivery of purchases up to 100 GEL costs 3 GEL, delivery above 100 GEL is free. Delivery is carried out in Tbilisi, Rustavi, Batumi, Kutaisi, Gori, Telavi, Kobuleti, Poti, Zugdidi.
